snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 18: Sonic Universe 2
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Universe 2
Credit: Alexandre Martins @lex
Release Date: Possibly 2001

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 = Intro
00:46 = Character Select
01:06 = Stage 1 A   Episode 1: Starting the Adventure...
02:20 = Stage 1 B
02:57 = Stage 1 C
04:16 = Loading Cutscene
04:34 = Stage 2 A  Episode 2: More Action!
05:40 = Stage 2 B
06:48 = Stage 2 C
07:20 = Boss (Loading)
07:42 = Stage 3 A Episode 3: Robotnik
08:38 = Stage 3 B
09:16 = Cutscene
09:46 = Stage 3 C
10:48 = Cutscene
11:33 = Final Stage Episode 4: Save the planet!!
12:10 = Ending
14:00 = Credits
15:00 = Bonus Stage
15:15 = Espio Gameplay

NOTES:

(TRANSLATIONS)

(Credits)
Programmer
Music and Sounds
Thanks to:

Special Thanks to: You! Thanks for playing! And ... Do not think that game ends here!

(RECORDING ISSUE)
Apologies for bad quality
(Details)
1. The game refuses to work on Windows 7
2. I had to use an old PC to run this.
(FPS) The game runs smoothly but i had to use old recording software that refuses to record on 60 FPS
(Audio) The old recording software could not detect Stereo Mix so the audio is recorded via the Mic.

(PASSWORDS)

(Press C on Title)
euquero70vidas
